You flash a small glare in her direction, which she either fails to notice or disregards as she speaks again, "We are testing how strong of a smell you can endure, after all. And aside from her not washing them as it is, what better way than to add the smell of fresh sweat from a good workout!" She was far too pleased with this.

But without another word, she turns around and looks in Yuki's direction. The moment Yuki turns around to mess with her locker, you can feel yourself drop, and when you looked down, as expected, it was the mouth to her shoe. You landed with a small squish sound, which definitely was in response to the sweat already built up. Apparently, this girl wasn't fond of cleaning out her shoes, alongside her feet. Though you didn't know if the latter part was true yet, but you could only imagine it was. Albeit, you would be finding out very shortly.

You looked around, trying to ignore your now soaked hands as you leaned against this 'floor'. Seeing as it was a shoe, there obviously wasn't anything there, save the darkness that led to the area for her toes and the overwhelming smell that felt as though it was punching you in the face. Though despite that, it wasn't quite as bad as you would have expected from a gym shoe. Maybe things wouldn't be so bad after all..?

You also questioned how Haruhi intended to continue this 'experiment'. Not sweat, so the goal was to have her enter with bare feet, and by the time this ended, he would be plastered underfoot.
